title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new pdf emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, it does not have any effect.
OB: The display property 'none' does not result in hiding the item in the generated PDF.
EB: The item with the display property set to 'none' should be hidden in the generated PDF.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Add a label. 2. Open the 'properties' view. 3. Set the 'sectionDisplay' property of the label to 'none'. 4. Generate the PDF and observe that the label is not visible in the generated PDF.
